title: The Corpse Of Adam Terrace
content:

[[module Rate]]

------

[[div class="blockquote" style="border-radius:10px; margin:10px"]]
[[=]]
**__Commentary__**
,,(I uh. did not realize that you could add commentary to the main art page so I'm just copy-pasting my Author Post),,

Made in honor of Remixcon 2023, although I ended up finishing a few hours after of the official deadline.

For a while now I've been working on an AU based on [[[SCP-4974]]] (which I eventually hope to write for), where, instead of committing suicide after his experiment kills his son, Paul Terrace goes on a quest to find a way to bring his son back to life. So when I saw the theme of Remixcon, I knew I had to draw something with my AU! Those of you who are familiar with the source article may notice a familiar shape in the sky...
[[/=]]
[[/div]]
author: Pressed Bunson
